data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Heerenveen take a 0-1 lead thanks to Benjamin Nygren.
In the minute 25, Heerenveen move into a 0-2 lead through a Jan Paul van Hecke header.
That's a fine assist from Joey Veerman.
The home team has substituted Danzell Gravenberch with Emanuel Emegha. Henk Fraser is thus making his first change.
In the minute 42, It's now 0-3 in Rotterdam as Henk Veerman scores for Heerenveen.
Benjamin Nygren with an assist there.
The first-half has come to a close in Rotterdam.
In the minute 46, The second half has started at Sparta Stadium Het Kasteel.
At Sparta Stadium Het Kasteel, Laros Duarte has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Heerenveen take a comfortable 0-4 lead thanks to Henk Veerman.
In the minute 57, Joey Veerman instrumental with a fine assist.
Johnny Jansen (Heerenveen) is making a first substitution, with Sieben Dewaele replacing Oliver Batista Meier.
Deroy Duarte is replacing Tom Beugelsdijk for the home team.
In the minute 76, The away team have replaced Benjamin Nygren with Ibrahim Dresevic. This is the second substitution made today by Johnny Jansen.
Henk Fraser is making the team's third substitution at Sparta Stadium Het Kasteel with Wouter Burger replacing Mica Pinto.
It seems as if Abdou Harroui is unable to continue. Aaron Meijers replaces him for the home team.
In the minute 87, Rein Smit is replacing Henk Veerman for Heerenveen at Sparta Stadium Het Kasteel.
Johnny Jansen (Heerenveen) is making a fourth substitution, with Rami Hajal replacing Joey Veerman.
Sparta have been given a penalty...
Bas Nijhuis blows to end the match. The final score is 1-4.
Goal! Sparta now trail just 1-4 thanks to a Lennart Thy spot-kick.
